title: CONSTELLATION SOFTWARE COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF COMPUTER SOFTWARE INNOVATIONS
companyAbout: CSWI is a provider of Financial Software Solutions to the public sector market. The CSWI software solutions have established CSWI as a major software provider to school districts and local governments in the southeastern United States. CSWI offers a fully integrated suite of software products from financials and human resources to revenues and citizen services. CSWI also provides Technology Solutions and Cloud Services, focused primarily on the public sector market, particularly K-12 education. Its Technology Solution division delivers classroom and enterprise solutions including borderless networks, datacenter and virtualization, physical security and infrastructure, video collaboration and instructional technologies while also providing Hosted Voice, Hosted Email and Identity Management solutions. More information about CSWI is available at www.csioutfitters.com.

Today, those same values drive Ormed’s software and service enhancements to continuously improve on the business processes designed specifically for hospitals in the areas of supply chain management, finance, human capital management, decision support and systems management.
